gen:link.msg:message: `CumulatedRemunerationAntiCumulationApproach` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` groter is dan 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivableUnduePaymentsExplanation` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `UnduePayments` groter is dan 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationMaximumOrHigherIndividualRemunerationSeniorOfficerAntiAccumulation` MOET gerapporteerd worden met `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis`, omdat `NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis` gebruikt wordt. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesSeniorOfficialsRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulated_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialRemuneration1700OrMoreAccumulatedAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
